name: Ricky E. COSTA et al. v. PLAINVILLE BOARD OF EDUCATION et al.
name_abbreviation: Costa v. Plainville Bd. of Educ.

parties:
Ricky E. COSTA et al.
v.
PLAINVILLE BOARD OF EDUCATION et al.
attorneys: The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 402, 167 A.3d 1152 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Ricky E. COSTA et al.
v.
PLAINVILLE BOARD OF EDUCATION et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided November 15, 2017
Harold J. Geragosian, in support of the petition.
Beatrice S. Jordan, in opposition.
The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 402, 167 A.3d 1152 (2017), is denied.
